name: CashByKing Admin Panel
description: Admin control panel for CashByKing platform

icons.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><defs><linearGradient id='grad' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'><stop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23ef4444;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23dc2626;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient></defs><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' fill='url(%23grad)'/><text x='50' y='70' font-size='45' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-family='Arial, sans-serif' font-weight='bold'>⚙</text></svg>
